  • Method Details

    • importProducts

      java.util.HashSet<MenuItem> importProducts()
      Postconditions:
      itemss!= null;

    • modifyProduct

      void modifyProduct​(MenuItem menuItem, java.lang.String name, float rating, int cal, int protein, int sodium, int fat, int price)
      method that manages the products
      Parameters:
      menuItem - menu item that will be changed
      name - the new name
      rating - the new rating
      cal - the new calories field
      protein - new amount of protein
      sodium - new amount of sodium
      fat - new amount of fat
      price - new amount price
      Preconditions:
      menuItem != null, wellFormed()
      Postconditions:
      menuItem != null

    • deleteProduct

      void deleteProduct​(MenuItem menuItem)
      method that will delete an item from the "database"
      Parameters:
      menuItem - the item to be deleted
      Preconditions:
      menuItem !=null the item should not be null
      Postconditions:
      !items.contains(menuItem);

    • addProduct

      void addProduct​(MenuItem menuItem)
      Parameters:
      menuItem - the item to be added to the menu
      Preconditions:
      menuItem != null
      Postconditions:
      items.contains(item)

    • generateReports

      java.lang.String generateReports​(java.util.Calendar calendar)
      Parameters:
      calendar - the date needed for the report
      Returns:
      a string containing all the orders/products that satisfy the conditions
      Preconditions:
      calendar != null

    • createOrder

      void createOrder​(Order order, java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> items, User user)
      methods that creates a new order
      Parameters:
      order - order to be created, with the id already set
      items - items to be added to the delivery service
      user - the user that created the order
      Preconditions:
      order != null, items != null, user != null
      Postconditions:
      order != null, orderArrayListHashtable.contains(items)

    • computeOrderPrice

      int computeOrderPrice​(Order order)
      Parameters:
      order - order to have its price computed
      Returns:
      price
      Preconditions:
      order != null
      Postconditions:
      price > 0

    • generateBill

      void generateBill​(Order order, int totalPrice, java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> itemsOrdered)
      Parameters:
      order - order to be showed
      totalPrice - total price of the order
      itemsOrdered - items that were ordered
      Preconditions:
      order != null, totalPrice >0

    • generateReportsTimeInterval

      java.lang.String generateReportsTimeInterval​(int minH, int maxH)
      Parameters:
      minH - the min hour
      maxH - the max hour => interval between those 2
      Returns:
      a string containing all the orders that satisfy the conditions
      Preconditions:
      minH > 0 and maxH > 0 and minH < maxH

    • generateProductNrTimes

      java.lang.String generateProductNrTimes​(int nrTimes)
      Parameters:
      nrTimes - the amount of times a product has been ordered
      Returns:
      a string containing all the orders that satisfy the conditions
      Preconditions:
      nrTimes >=0

    • generateClientsNrTimes

      java.lang.String generateClientsNrTimes​(int nrTimes, int totalAmount)
      Parameters:
      nrTimes - the amount of times a product has been ordered
      totalAmount - the amount of an order in order to client to be considered good for the report
      Returns:
      a string containing all the clients that satisfy the conditions
      Preconditions:
      nrTimes >=0 and totalAmount >=0

    • findItems

      java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> findItems​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String rating, java.lang.String cal, java.lang.String protein, java.lang.String fat, java.lang.String sodium, java.lang.String price)
      Parameters:
      name - to be searched
      rating - to be searched
      cal - to be searched
      protein - to be searched
      fat - to be searched
      sodium - to be searched
      price - to be searched
      Returns:
      an array of items that satisfy the conditions
      Preconditions:
      items != null
